yeah, it only works with skirmish. it's just a cat-a-cat games copy of the other version. same thing, clicking "proceed" on campaign takes you to the skirmish lobby. 

if anyone figures out how to make the campaign work I'm sure we'd all be grateful, but as is with this if you download and install it, it won't launch the campaign. sends you automatically to skirmish lobby.

posting this again cause my comment isn't showing up for whatever reason, clicking on "proceed" to start the campaign sends you straight to the skirmish lobby, same as if you clicked on skirmish. 

bummer. game does work otherwise just fine though.
